00029 #ifndef SC_SIGNAL_RV_H
00030 #define SC_SIGNAL_RV_H
00031 
00032 #include "sysc/communication/sc_signal.h"
00033 #include "sysc/datatypes/bit/sc_lv.h"
00034 
00035 namespace sc_core {
00036 
00037 class sc_process_b;
00038 
00039 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 //  CLASS sc_lv_resolve<W>
00041 //
00042 //  Resolution function for sc_dt::sc_lv<W>.
00043 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00044 
00045 extern SC_API const sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t sc_logic_resolution_tbl[4][4];
00046 
00047 
00048 template <int W>
00049 class sc_lv_resolve
00050 {
00051 public:
00052 
00053     // resolves sc_dt::sc_lv<W> values and returns the resolved value
00054     static void resolve(sc_dt::sc_lv<W>&, const std::vector<sc_dt::sc_lv<W>*>&);
00055 };
00056 
00057 
00058 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00059 
00060 // resolves sc_dt::sc_lv<W> values and returns the resolved value
00061 
00062 template <int W>
00063 inline
00064 void
00065 sc_lv_resolve<W>::resolve( sc_dt::sc_lv<W>& result_,
00066                            const std::vector<sc_dt::sc_lv<W>*>& values_ )
00067 {
00068     int sz = values_.size();
00069 
00070     sc_assert( sz != 0 );
00071 
00072     if( sz == 1 ) {
00073         result_ = *values_[0];
00074         return;
00075     }
00076 
00077     for( int j = result_.length() - 1; j >= 0; -- j ) {
00078         sc_dt::sc_logic_value_t res = (*values_[0])[j].value();
00079         for( int i = sz - 1; i > 0 && res != 3; -- i ) {
00080             res = sc_logic_resolution_tbl[res][(*values_[i])[j].value()];
00081         }
00082         result_[j] = res;
00083     }
00084 }
00085 
00086 
00087 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 //  CLASS : sc_signal_rv<W>
00089 //
00090 //  The resolved vector signal class.
00091 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00092 
00093 template <int W>
00094 class sc_signal_rv
00095 : public sc_signal<sc_dt::sc_lv<W>, SC_MANY_WRITERS>
00096 {
00097 public:
00098 
00099     // typedefs
00100 
00101     typedef sc_signal_rv<W>                             this_type;
00102     typedef sc_signal<sc_dt::sc_lv<W>, SC_MANY_WRITERS> base_type;
00103     typedef sc_dt::sc_lv<W>                             value_type;
00104 
00105 public:
00106 
00107     // constructors
00108 
00109     sc_signal_rv()
00110       : base_type( sc_gen_unique_name( "signal_rv" ) )
00111     {}
00112 
00113     explicit sc_signal_rv( const char* name_ )
00114       : base_type( name_, value_type() )
00115     {}
00116 
00117     sc_signal_rv( const char* name_, const value_type& initial_value_ )
00118       : base_type( name_, initial_value_ )
00119     {}
00120 
00121 
00122     // destructor
00123     virtual ~sc_signal_rv();
00124 
00125 
00126     // interface methods
00127 
00128     virtual void register_port( sc_port_base&, const char* )
00129         {}
00130 
00131 
00132     // write the new value
00133     virtual void write( const value_type& );
00134 
00135 
00136     // other methods
00137     virtual const char* kind() const
00138         { return "sc_signal_rv"; }
00139 
00140 
00141     // assignment
00142     this_type& operator = ( const value_type& a )
00143       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00144 
00145     this_type& operator = ( const sc_signal_in_if<value_type>& a )
00146       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00147 
00148     this_type& operator = ( const this_type& a )
00149       { base_type::operator=(a); return *this; }
00150 
00151 protected:
00152 
00153     virtual void update();
00154 
00155 protected:
00156 
00157     std::vector<sc_process_b*> m_proc_vec; // processes writing this signal
00158     std::vector<value_type*>   m_val_vec;  // new values written this signal
00159 
00160 private:
00161 
00162     // disabled
00163     sc_signal_rv( const this_type& );
00164 };
00165 
00166 
00167 // IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII
00168 
00169 
00170 // destructor
00171 
00172 template <int W>
00173 inline
00174 sc_signal_rv<W>::~sc_signal_rv()
00175 {
00176     for( int i = m_val_vec.size() - 1; i >= 0; -- i ) {
00177         delete m_val_vec[i];
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 // write the new value
00183 
00184 template <int W>
00185 inline
00186 void
00187 sc_signal_rv<W>::write( const value_type& value_ )
00188 {
00189     sc_process_b* cur_proc = sc_get_current_process_b();
00190 
00191     bool value_changed = false;
00192     bool found = false;
00193     
00194     for( int i = m_proc_vec.size() - 1; i >= 0; -- i ) {
00195         if( cur_proc == m_proc_vec[i] ) {
00196             if( value_ != *m_val_vec[i] ) {
00197                 *m_val_vec[i] = value_;
00198                 value_changed = true;
00199             }
00200             found = true;
00201             break;
00202         }
00203     }
00204     
00205     if( ! found ) {
00206         m_proc_vec.push_back( cur_proc );
00207         m_val_vec.push_back( new value_type( value_ ) );
00208         value_changed = true;
00209     }
00210     
00211     if( value_changed ) {
00212         this->request_update();
00213     }
00214 }
00215 
00216 
00217 template <int W>
00218 inline
00219 void
00220 sc_signal_rv<W>::update()
00221 {
00222     sc_lv_resolve<W>::resolve( this->m_new_val, m_val_vec );
00223     base_type::update();
00224 }
00225 
00226 } // namespace sc_core
